species.name: calyrex
descriptions: Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of providing healing and blessings. It reigned over the Galar region in times of yore.
Calyrex is known in legend as a king that ruled over Galar in ancient times. It has the power to cause hearts to mend and plants to spring forth.

abilities.name: unnerve
abilities.effect: Prevents opposing Pokémon from eating held Berries.
